text: Patients commonly take complementary medicines in conjunction with conventional drugs without clear evidence of safety or the risk of herb–drug interactions.

The aim of this study was to assess potential pharmacokinetic (PK) and pharmacodynamic (PD) interactions between St John's wort and gliclazide in healthy subjects with different cytochrome P450 2C9 (CYP2C9) genotypes.
label: Herb name

text: A crossover controlled study was conducted in 21 healthy subjects.
label: Study

text: Each received gliclazide (80 mg) either alone or during 15 days treatment with St John's wort.
